title: Quarkus component integration on Cloud Providers

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description

Document how to use:

- Hibernate on AWS and Azure (using AWS and Azure services)
- Redis on AWS and Azure (using AWS and Azure services) - including quarkus cache
- Kafka (using AWS and Azure services)
- AMQP (using AWS and Azure services)

It should cover:

- authentication/credentials
- URL/Access
- with and without VPC when possible
- known limitations

Cloud providers tend to have multiple services for databases and brokers. 

### Analysis
(links to analysis docs containing architecture design work, requirements gathering, etc)
